item.name: Ampule of Misty Step
entries: An ampule filled with whirling mists. As a bonus action, a user can break the ampule to immediately cast {@spell Misty Step}.

item.name: Moundheart
entries: You have a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.

entries.name: Whip
entries: As an action, you can cast {@spell Thorn Whip} using your melee attack modifier for the Sword.

Once a mere blade, this longsword was reborn when lightning struck its wielder amidst a dense forest. From the aftermath, a Shambling Mound emerged, its heart pulsating with the very sword that witnessed the storm's wrath.
